thread.section_title: Cosumnes River Predicted To Flood Overnight Near Wilton, Residents Urged To Evacuate – CBS Sacramento
thread.title: Cosumnes River Predicted To Flood Overnight Near Wilton, Residents Urged To Evacuate
thread.title_full: Cosumnes River Predicted To Flood Overnight Near Wilton, Residents Urged To Evacuate

author: Cecilio Padilla
title: Cosumnes River Predicted To Flood Overnight Near Wilton, Residents Urged To Evacuate
text:
WILTON (CBS13) – Authorities are alerting residents near Wilton to consider evacuating now due to rising flood waters.
The National Weather Service is forecasting that the Cosumnes River will rise high enough to overtop its south bank overnight into Wednesday.
According to their predictions, NWS says the Cosumnes River may crest about 2 feet above flood stage.
Damaging flooding forecast @ Wilton overnite. River will rise high enough to overtop along its south bank. Consider evacuating now! #CAFlood pic.twitter.com/8EhZuGPycD 
— NWS Sacramento (@NWSSacramento) January 10, 2017 

NWS says that, in the past, homes near Wilton were flooded by these levels.
